Log 2022.07-

2022.07.28

GSFE 有三种算法：

  1. ab initio，即粗暴构建SQS。

  2. NEB，是链式优化求过度态的方法。确定N个基态构型后，寻找energy-based的状态迁移最优路径。在atomistic model下，可以通过对势能面的求导来获得梯度方向。

HOW TO?

> Merging POSCARs of the initial and final configurations, after geometrical relaxation. Localizing the new interpolated POSCAR file into the main directory, along with executable files (INCAR POTCAR KPOINTS), note that some extra parameters should be covered in INCAR file for NEB, convergence test should be undergone as well.

> Transition states, e.g. usf, isf, utf configurations, could be settled as ‘anchor points’ during NEB calculation. Those additional configurations (POSCARs) should be stored in the subdirectories, indexed between the ini- and fin-structures. The calculation will be carried out within each subdirectory.

> Potential energy surfaces will then be approximated during the calculation process. Thus those saddle points, energy barriers, ‘optimized’ trajectories, could be obtained from the results.

  1. EMTO-CPA，不太了解。计算量相对较小，因为不采用大体系晶胞，而是选择构建描述格子, e.g.八面体。

2022.10.05

插值，值插越多越好
